attributes.action: Make it mandatory for public buildings such to have defibrillators installed
attributes.additional_details: To help save more lives in the UK which we were starkly reminded that a Cardiac Arrest can happen to anyone. A defibrillator can be used by any member of the public to help save a life. The machine WILL NOT shock anyone who will not benefit from this and is very easy to use. In the case of a person in Cardiac Arrest they have  1in10 chance of surviving. A defibrillator is the only way to get the heart back into a life saving rhythm.
attributes.background: Make it mandatory for public buildings such as schools, libraries and leisure centres to have defibrillators in case of an emergency.
